roleset.name: entertain

example.name: transitive, all args
example.text: He regaled Claire with an account of the mock mass performed [*] by thecassocked bloods , which he had had []at firsthand from old Bud Dodington, one of the leaders of the so-called `` Order '' .
example.arg: with an account of the mock mass performed [*] by thecassocked bloods , which he had had []at firsthand from old Bud Dodington, one of the leaders of the so-called `` Order ''

roleset.note: REGALE-V NOTES: Framed by Neville based on Brown. (from regale.01-v)
